Text:
Your second release of Rookie Blue, and again - frame rate's fucked up and temporary freezes across the whole video. 
For God's sake, Immerse, drop this series. You got no idea what the hell you're doing.

Just to be as clear as possible - video rarely goes fluent and frames skip like 4 times a second.
People, don't waste your time downloading this big pile of crap. Not worth your time, which I've waited 8 hours to finish the download.

I'm using MPC-HC to view tv shows, and this episode was ok.
Yeah there were a couple of moments when part of the picture was in wrong colors, but no freezes|stops.
Yup seems to work ok for me, using ZoomPlayer with LAV decoders for both audio and video.
